DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate that anecortave acetate is superior to placebo in maintenance of visual acuity at the 12- and 24-month visits.
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation of Safety and Efficacy of Anecortave Acetate Versus Placebo in Patients With Subfoveal CNV Due to Exudative AMD
DOC.criteria: Patients at least 50 years of age, of any race, and either sex with a clinical diagnosis of exudative AMD and a primary or recurrent subfoveal CNV lesion in the study eye.
